AIResearchPromptResult.name: AIResearchPromptResult
AIResearchPromptResult.description: Represents the research result generated by Einstein from a prompt template.

IsToxicityDetected.description: Specifies whether the generated response contains toxic language (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

LatestErrorMessage.description: The error message that displays if the result can't be generated.

LatestGenResponseIdRef.description: The ID of the most recently generated result in the GenAIGeneration object. The object is derived from the Data Cloud data model object (DMO).

LatestGenerationDate.description: The date and time that the result was most recently generated.

LatestSafetyScore.description: Overall safety score for the generated research. A higher value means the generated response is more likely to be safe. Minimum value of 0.0. Maximum value of 1.0.

LatestStatus.description: The status of the generated result.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the generated research result.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The record ID that the research result was generated for.

StandardPromptTemplate.description: The standard prompt template used to generate the result.

AIResearchPromptResult.accessRules: Einstein features with Einstein generative AI
